author: Carolyn Ray
description: The Fertility Partners took over Conceptia last week after months of outcry from patients who said they were left in the dark about their treatments. The company is vowing to expand the clinic and cut down on long waitlists.
title: Moncton fertility clinic to expand, tackle waitlists under new owner
content: The CEO of the company that has taken over the fertility clinic in Moncton says they're making immediate changes that he believes will have a significant impact on fertility services in Atlantic Cana… [+3935 chars]

author: Shane Magee
description: A four-week jury trial for a man accused of murdering his common-law partner last year has been rescheduled from this summer to next spring in Moncton.
title: Moncton murder trial moved to spring 2022
content:
A four-week jury trial for a man accused of murdering his common-law partner last year has been rescheduled from this summer to next spring in Moncton.

author: Shane Magee
description: Marissa Shephard has pleaded guilty to manslaughter in connection with the brutal 2015 killing of Baylee Wylie in Moncton.
title: Marissa Shephard pleads guilty to manslaughter, arson
content:
Marissa Shephard has pleaded guilty to manslaughter in connection with the brutal 2015 killing of Baylee Wylie in Moncton.

description: Twelve separate lawsuits have been filed against Moncton-based cannabis producer Organigram following a legionnaires' disease outbreak in 2019.
title: 12 sue Organigram over 2019 legionnaires' disease outbreak
content:
